mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ACCOUNT_CODE as accountCode, a.DAILY_PNL as dailyPnl, a.UNREALIZED_PNL as unrealizedPnl, a.REALIZED_PNL as realizedPnl, a.REMARK as remark, a.CREATE_DATE as createDate, a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , DAILY_PNL , UNREALIZED_PNL , REALIZED_PNL , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{accountCode} , #{dailyPnl} , #{unrealizedPnl} , #{realizedPnl} , #{remark} , #{createDate} , #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
ACCOUNT_CODE ,
DAILY_PNL ,
UNREALIZED_PNL ,
REALIZED_PNL ,
REMARK ,
CREATE_DATE ,
UPDATE_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{accountCode} ,
#{dailyPnl} ,
#{unrealizedPnl} ,
#{realizedPnl} ,
#{remark} ,
#{createDate} ,
#{updateDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} ,
DAILY_PNL = #{dailyPnl} ,
UNREALIZED_PNL = #{unrealizedPnl} ,
REALIZED_PNL = #{realizedPnl} ,
REMARK = #{remark} ,
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} ,
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , DAILY_PNL , UNREALIZED_PNL , REALIZED_PNL , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.accountCode} , #{item.dailyPnl} , #{item.unrealizedPnl} , #{item.realizedPnl} , #{item.remark} , #{item.createDate} , #{item.updateDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , ACCOUNT_CODE = #{item.accountCode} , DAILY_PNL = #{item.dailyPnl} , UNREALIZED_PNL = #{item.unrealizedPnl} , REALIZED_PNL = #{item.realizedPnl} , REMARK = #{item.remark} , CREATE_DATE = #{item.createDate} , UPDATE_DATE = #{item.updateDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} , DAILY_PNL = #{dailyPnl} , UNREALIZED_PNL = #{unrealizedPnl} , REALIZED_PNL = #{realizedPnl} , REMARK = #{remark} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM IB_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PNL a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
